title: Overall Tone
description: The emotional flavor of the message (friendly, neutral, persuasive, apologetic, etc.).

title: Formality Level
description: Degree of professional vs. casual language, contractions, and honorifics.

title: Politeness Strategy
description: Use of softening phrases, hedges, and courtesy markers that manage face-threatening acts.

title: Length & Conciseness
description: Total word count, sentence brevity, and elimination of redundancy.

title: Paragraph Structure
description: Logical flow, use of bullets or numbered lists, and segmentation of ideas.

title: Call-to-Action Clarity
description: Explicit next steps, deadlines, or questions posed to the recipient.

title: Jargon & Terminology
description: Use—or avoidance—of technical terms, acronyms, and insider language.

title: Sensitivity & Confidentiality
description: Handling of private or delicate information and compliance with privacy norms.

title: Visual Formatting
description: Use of bold, italics, spacing, and line breaks to enhance readability.
